column13: Woolworths supports our farmers upstream to reduce food waste in landfills through initiatives such as the Odd Bunch. column13: In the current year, we broadened our solutions beyond metropolitan areas by collaborating with existing partners and experimenting with new services. It included the introduction of the Wodonga Vic Backhaul transport solution, utilising A.C.T. GoTerra (black soldier fly larvae technology), and establishing a remote store partnership with B.H.P. in Roxby Downs, SA. Through these initiatives, we have successfully implemented food waste recycling services, allowing nine stores to divert food waste that would have otherwise been challenging to manage.
column20: Wodonga Vic, Backhaul transport solution, trialling new services
